00037 class CsgBoltzmann
00038     : public CsgApplication
00039 {
00040 public:
00041 
00042     string ProgramName() { return "csg_boltzmann"; }
00043     void HelpText(ostream &out) {
00044         out << "Perform tasks that are needed for simple boltzmann\n"
00045             "inversion in an interactive environment.";
00046     }
00047     bool DoTrajectory() { return true; }
00048     bool DoMapping() { return true; }
00049 
00050     void Initialize();
00051     void Run();
00052 
00053     void InteractiveMode();
00054     bool EvaluateTopology(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00055 
00056 protected:
00057

00059     BondedStatistics _bs;

00062 void CsgBoltzmann::Initialize()
00063 {
00064     CsgApplication::Initialize();
00065     AddProgramOptions("Special options")
00066         ("excl", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "write exclusion list to file");
00067 
00068     AddObserver(&_bs);
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool CsgBoltzmann::EvaluateTopology(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref)
00072 {
00073     if (OptionsMap().count("excl")) {
00074         ExclusionList *ex;
00075         if (top_ref->MoleculeCount() > 1)
00076             cout << "WARNING: cannot create exclusion list for topology with"
00077                 "multiple molecules, using only first molecule\n";
00078 
00079         cout << "Writing exclusion list for atomistic molecule "
00080                 << top_ref->MoleculeByIndex(0)->getName()
00081                 << " in coarse grained representation "
00082                 << top_ref->MoleculeByIndex(0)->getName() << endl;
00083 
00084         ex = CreateExclusionList(*top_ref->MoleculeByIndex(0), *top->MoleculeByIndex(0));
00085         ofstream fl;
00086         fl.open(OptionsMap()["excl"].as<string > ().c_str());
00087         fl << "# atomistic: " << top_ref->MoleculeByIndex(0)->getName()
00088                 << " cg: " << top_ref->MoleculeByIndex(0)->getName()
00089                 << " cgmap: " << OptionsMap()["cg"].as<string > () << endl;
00090         fl << *ex;
00091         fl.close();
00092         delete ex;
00093         return false;
00094     }
00095     return true;
00096 }
00097 
00098 ExclusionList *CsgBoltzmann::CreateExclusionList(Molecule &atomistic, Molecule &cg)
00099 {
00100     list<int> exclude;
00101    
00102     ExclusionList *ex = new ExclusionList();
00103     ex->ExcludeAll(atomistic.BeadCount());
00104 
00105     // reintroduce bead internal nonbonded interaction
00106     for(int i=0; i<cg.BeadCount(); ++i) {
00107         exclude.clear();
00108         
00109         vector<int> &v = cg.getBead(i)->ParentBeads();
00110         exclude.insert(exclude.begin(), v.begin(), v.end());
00111         ex->Remove(exclude);
00112     }
00113 
00114     Topology *top_cg = cg.getParent();
00115     InteractionContainer::iterator iter;
00116     // reintroduce nonbonded interactions for bonded beads
00117     for(iter = top_cg->BondedInteractions().begin();
00118             iter!=top_cg->BondedInteractions().end(); ++iter) {
00119         Interaction *ic = *iter;
00120         exclude.clear();
00121         for(int i=0; i<ic->BeadCount(); i++) {
00122             vector<int> &v = top_cg->getBead(ic->getBeadId(i))->ParentBeads();
00123             exclude.insert(exclude.end(), v.begin(), v.end());
00124         }
00125         ex->Remove(exclude);
00126     }
00127     return ex;
00128 }
00129 
00130 void CsgBoltzmann::Run()
00131 {
00132     CsgApplication::Run();
00133     if (OptionsMap().count("excl"))
00134         return;
00135     InteractiveMode();
00136 }
00137 
00138 void CsgBoltzmann::InteractiveMode()
00139 {    
00140     std::map<std::string, AnalysisTool *> cmds;
00141     TabulatedPotential tab;
00142     StdAnalysis std;
00143     tab.Register(cmds);
00144     std.Register(cmds);
00145     
00146     string help_text = 
00147         "Interactive mode, expecting commands:\n"
00148         "help: show this help\n"
00149         "q: quit\n"
00150         "list: list all available bonds\n"
00151         "vals <file> <selection>: write values to file\n"
00152         "hist <file> <selection>: create histogram\n"
00153         "tab <file> <selection>: create tabulated potential\n"
00154         "autocor <file> <selection>: calculate autocorrelation, only one row allowed in selection!\n" 
00155         "cor <file> <selection>: calculate correlations, first row is correlated with all other rows";
00156 
00157     cout << help_text << endl;
00158     
00159     while(1) {
00160         string line;
00161         cout << "> ";
00162         getline(cin, line);
00163 
00164         boost::trim(line);
00165         vector<string> args;
00166         Tokenizer tok(line, " \t");
00167         tok.ToVector(args);
00168 
00169         if(args.size() == 0) continue;
00170 
00171         string cmd = args.front();
00172         args.erase(args.begin());
00173 
00174     
00175             if(cmd == "q") break;            
00176 
00177             std::map<string, AnalysisTool *>::iterator tool;
00178             if(cmd == "help") {
00179                 if(args.size() == 0) {
00180                     cout << help_text << endl;
00181                     continue;
00182                 }
00183                 cmd = args.front();
00184                 args.erase(args.begin());
00185                 tool = cmds.find(cmd);
00186                 if(tool == cmds.end()) {
00187                     cout << "error, no help item found" << endl;
00188                     continue;
00189                 }
00190                 tool->second->Help(cmd, args);
00191                 cout << endl;
00192                 continue;
00193             }
00194 
00195             tool = cmds.find(cmd);
00196             if(tool == cmds.end()) {
00197                 cout << "error, command not found" << endl;
00198                 continue;
00199             }
00200             
00201             tool->second->Command(_bs, cmd, args);
00202     }
00203 }
00204 
00205 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00206 {
00207     CsgBoltzmann app;
00208     app.Exec(argc, argv);
00209 }
